name: Koelsch Tycoon
description:
In Köln (Germany) people like to drink their local beer called "Kölsch".

All of a sudden, you have a business idea: Buy a wagon, fill it with Kölsch and sell it on some public places. No sooner said than done:

Buy wagons, buy beer, fill the wagons and assign them to a public place to serve the people's needs for that cold, blonde "water from Kölle".

Don't forget to find the right price and invest in scientific research to gain your business. Keep an eye on the weather and do not send empty wagons to markets, your employees will be payed anyway.

☟  Start the game just below  ☟
